sourcesContent:
import * as actionTypes from './actionTypes';
import * as actioncreators from './actioncreators';

const initialstate = {
    loading: false,
    Auth: [],
    movies: [],
    cinemas: [],
    genres: [],
    upcoming: [],
    error: ''
}


const reducer = (state = initialstate, action) => {
    switch (action.type) {
        case actionTypes.FETCH_AUTH_REQUEST:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: true
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_AUTH_SUCCESS:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: action.payload,
                movies: state.movies,
                cinemas: state.cinemas,
                genres: state.genres,
                upcoming: state.upcoming,
                error: ''
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_AUTH_FAILURE:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: [],
                movies: state.movies,
                cinemas: state.cinemas,
                genres: state.genres,
                upcoming: state.upcoming,
                error: action.payload
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_MOVIES_REQUEST:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: true
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_MOVIES_SUCCESS:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: state.Auth,
                movies: action.payload,
                cinemas: state.cinemas,
                genres: state.genres,
                upcoming: state.upcoming,
                error: ''
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_MOVIES_FAILURE:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: state.Auth,
                movies: [],
                cinemas: state.cinemas,
                genres: state.genres,
                upcoming: state.upcoming,
                error: action.payload
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_CINEMAS_REQUEST:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: true
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_CINEMAS_SUCCESS:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: state.Auth,
                movies: state.movies,
                cinemas: action.payload,
                genres: state.genres,
                upcoming: state.upcoming,
                error: ''
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_CINEMAS_FAILURE:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: state.Auth,
                movies: state.movies,
                cinemas: [],
                genres: state.genres,
                upcoming: state.upcoming,
                error: action.payload
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_GENRES_REQUEST:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: true
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_GENRES_SUCCESS:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: state.Auth,
                movies: state.movies,
                cinemas: state.cinemas,
                genres: action.payload,
                upcoming: state.upcoming,
                error: ''
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_GENRES_FAILURE:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: state.Auth,
                movies: state.movies,
                cinemas: state.cinemas,
                genres: [],
                upcoming: state.upcoming,
                error: action.payload
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_UPCOMING_REQUEST:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: true
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_UPCOMING_SUCCESS:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: state.Auth,
                movies: state.movies,
                cinemas: state.cinemas,
                genres: state.genres,
                upcoming: action.payload,
                error: ''
            }
        case actionTypes.FETCH_UPCOMING_FAILURE:
            return {
                ...state,
                loading: false,
                Auth: state.Auth,
                movies: state.movies,
                cinemas: state.cinemas,
                genres: state.genres,
                upcoming: [],
                error: action.payload
            }
        default: return state
    }
}
